comment: A basis is an independent spanning set. This could have been used as alternative definition of a basis: ` LBasis = ( w e. _V |-> { b e. ~P ( Base `` w ) | ( ( ( LSpan `` w ) ` ` `` b ) = ( Base `` w ) /\ b e. ( LIndS `` w ) ) } ) ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Feb-2015.)
